entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening and 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
